portfolioItems.title: TechStart Nigeria Website
portfolioItems.description: Modern corporate website for a technology startup
portfolioItems.fullDescription: We designed and developed a modern, responsive website for TechStart Nigeria, a technology startup focused on providing innovative solutions for African businesses. The website features a clean design, intuitive navigation, and optimized performance for all devices.
results: 50% increase in website traffic within 3 months

portfolioItems.title: HealthPlus Clinic POS System
portfolioItems.description: Complete POS solution for a private medical clinic
portfolioItems.fullDescription: We implemented a comprehensive POS system for HealthPlus Clinic, a private medical clinic in Lagos. The system handles patient registration, appointment scheduling, billing, and inventory management for medical supplies.

portfolioItems.title: Lagos Supermarket E-commerce
portfolioItems.description: Online store for a leading supermarket chain
portfolioItems.fullDescription: We developed a comprehensive e-commerce platform for Lagos Supermarket, one of the leading supermarket chains in Nigeria. The platform features product catalog management, online ordering, multiple payment options, and delivery tracking.
results: Expanded customer reach beyond physical locations

portfolioItems.title: SecureBank Security Audit
portfolioItems.description: Comprehensive security assessment for a financial institution
portfolioItems.fullDescription: We conducted a comprehensive security assessment for SecureBank, a financial institution in Nigeria. Our team performed vulnerability scanning, penetration testing (with written authorization), and security policy review to identify and address potential security risks.

portfolioItems.title: EduLearn Learning Platform
portfolioItems.description: Online learning platform for educational institutions
portfolioItems.fullDescription: We developed EduLearn, a comprehensive online learning platform for educational institutions in Nigeria. The platform features course management, student enrollment, progress tracking, and interactive learning tools.
results: Enabled 5 educational institutions to transition to online learning

portfolioItems.title: HotelPlus Management System
portfolioItems.description: Hotel management software installation and customization
portfolioItems.fullDescription: We installed and customized a comprehensive hotel management system for HotelPlus, a boutique hotel in Abuja. The system handles reservations, check-in/check-out, billing, inventory management, and reporting.
